week 4 have a higher attendance than week 3
resp:

3. Since the attendance for week 4 (72586) is greater than the attendance for week 3 (47922), it can be concluded that week 4 has a higher attendance than week 3.

claim: on november , 1997 when the new orleans saint be in the opponent have the least attendance of the season
resp:
Here are the reasoning steps:
1. Identify the week when the New Orleans Saints played (November 9, 1997). This corresponds to row 11 in the table.
2. Compare the attendance of that game with all other games in the table.
3. Note that the attendance for the New Orleans Saints' game against the Carolina Panthers (40,091) is less than their home attendance for any other game during the season. For instance, their home attendance for the game against Kansas City Chiefs on November 16, 1997 was 76,379.
4. Since the New Orleans Saints had a lower attendance in one of their home games than any other home game, it can be concluded that they had the least attendance of the season during their home game against the Carolina Panthers on November 9, 1997.

   The final answer is:
